page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: {JACOBS SHEEP _}quite a few of this breed are kept in the Layer area. The breed is mentioned in the Bible. They are believed to have arrived in this country as a result of a shipwreck from the Spanish Armada. The ewes are prolific and have a long breeding season. They are spotted and have two or four horns. In 1969 The Jacobs Sheep Society was formed to promote this rare breed. {LAYER MILL AND MUSHROOM FARM Layer Mill is mentioned in the original Domesday Book as a watermill. The mill wheel was powered by water from the Roman River. The mill has since been rebuilt. Adjoining the mill is a Mushroom Farm.
